anya-e0105n31:1_0: Aṭṭhasāliniṁ pana sammohavinodaniñca dhātukathādipañcapakaraṇassa aṭṭhakathañcāti tisso abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyo attanā sadisanāmena sotatthakīganthakārakena buddhaghosabhikkhunā āyācito akāsi.
anya-e0105n31:3_0: Bhikkhunā buddhaghosena, sakkaccaṁ abhiyācito’’ti dha. sa. aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n31:5_0: Ayaṁ aṭṭhasālinī nāma dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathā’’ti dha. sa. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n31:8_0: Yaṁ ārabhiṁ racayituṁ, aṭṭhakathaṁ sunipuṇesu atthesu;
anya-e0105n31:9_0: Sammohavinodanato, sammohavinodaniṁ nāmā’’ti vibha. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n31:11_0: Ayaṁ sammohavinodanī nāma vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathā’’ti vibha. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n31:12_0: Imāsu pana tīsu pañcapakaraṇaṭṭhakathāya nāmaviseso natthi āyācako ca na pakāsito, kevalaṁ attano saddhāya eva sañcoditena ācariyabuddhaghosena sā katā viya dissati.
anya-e0105n31:16_0: Saddhāya samāraddhā, yā aṭṭhakathā mayā tassāti ca.
anya-e0105n31:20_0: Tassa aṭṭhakathā esā, sakalassāpi niṭṭhitā’’ti paṭṭhā. aṭṭha. 19-24.1 ca.
anya-e0105n31:22_0: Ayaṁ sakalassapi abhidhammapiṭakassa aṭṭhakathā’’ti paṭṭhā. aṭṭha. 19-24.1 ca.
anya-e0105n31:23_0: Ekacce pana ādhunikā therā ‘‘abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyo ācariyabuddhaghosena yācito saṅghapālabuddhamittajotipālādīnaṁ aññataro thero akāsī’’ti vadanti.
anya-e0105n31:23_1: Ayañca nesaṁ vicāraṇā, aṭṭhasālinīsammohavinodanīsu ‘‘tā buddhaghosena yācito akāsī’’ti ganthakārena vuttaṁ.
anya-e0105n31:23_2: Tena ñāyati ‘‘takkārako añño, ācariyabuddhaghoso pana tāsu yācakapuggaloyevā’’ti.
anya-e0105n31:25_0: Iti pana sabbaṁ yasmā, visuddhimagge mayā suparisuddhaṁ;
anya-e0105n31:26_0: Vuttaṁ tasmā bhiyyo, na taṁ idha vicārayissāmī’’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā –
anya-e0105n31:27_0: Evaṁ sīlakathādīnaṁ attanā eva visuddhimagge vuttabhāvo mayātipadena pakāsito. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ pana –
anya-e0105n31:29_0: Visuddhimagge panidaṁ, yasmā sabbaṁ pakāsita’’nti dha. sa. aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā –
anya-e0105n31:30_2: Kiñcāpi abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu abhiyācako buddhaghoso bhikkhunāti ca yatināti ca imeheva sāmaññaguṇapadehi vutto na therenāti sagāravaguṇapadena, tathāpi so ‘‘visuddhācārasīlena nipuṇāmalabuddhinā’’ti ca, ‘‘adandhagatinā subuddhinā’’ti ca imehi adhikaguṇapadehi thomitattā ‘‘visuddhimaggādikārako ācariyabuddhaghosoyevā’’ti sakkā gahetuṁ.
anya-e0105n31:30_3: So hi upasampannakālatoyeva paṭṭhāya ganthakovido pariyattivisāradaguṇasampanno, tasmiñca kāle ūnadasavasso bhaveyya, tasmā therenāti na vuttoti sakkā gahetunti.
anya-e0105n31:31_1: Na hi ācariyabuddhaghosatthero ‘‘tasmiṁ kāle ūnadasavasso’’ti sakkā gahetuṁ, visuddhimagganigamanepi ‘‘buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therenā’’ti vacanato, na ca ‘‘visuddhācārasīlena, nipuṇāmalabuddhinā’’ti vā, ‘‘adandhagatinā subuddhinā’’ti vā ettakeheva dvīhi dvīhi guṇapadehi thomanena suthomito hoti, aññadatthu ‘‘nippabhīkatakhajjoto samudeti divākaro’’ti thomanaṁ viya hoti.
anya-e0105n31:32_0: ‘‘Paramavisuddhasaddhābaddhivīriyapaṭimaṇḍitena sīlācārajjavamaddavādiguṇasamudayasamuditena sakasamayasamayantaragahanajjhogāhaṇasamatthena paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatena tipiṭakapariyattibhede sāṭṭhakathe satthusāsane appaṭihatañāṇappabhāvena mahāveyyākaraṇenā’’tiādinā –
anya-e0105n31:33_0: Attano anucchavikāni guṇapadāni pakāsitāni, soyeva ca porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo saṅkhipitvā abhinavasaṅgahaṭṭhakathānaṁ ādikattā pubbaṅgamo, aññe pana abhinavaṭṭhakathākārā tasseva anuvattitvā avasesamekaṁ vā dve vā aṭṭhakathāyo akaṁsu.
anya-e0105n31:33_1: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu ca yo yo attho visuddhimagge vutto, so so yathānuppattaṭṭhāne tato gahetvā tatheva vutto.
anya-e0105n31:33_2: Visesato pana paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgakhandhāyatanadhātusaccavibhaṅgavaṇṇanāsu jhānakathāvaṇṇanāsu ca ayamattho ativiya pākaṭo, yopi ca tattha appako katipayamatto visuddhimaggena visadiso saṁvaṇṇanābhedo dissati, sopi ābhidhammikānaṁ matānusārena yathā porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṁ vutto, tatheva vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0105n31:33_3: Yathā ca aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya atideso dissati dha. sa. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n31:33_4: 1 akusalakammapathakathā, tatheva samantapāsādikāyampi aṭṭhasāliniyā atideso dissateva pārā. aṭṭha. 1.11;.
anya-e0105n31:33_5: Yadi ca aṭṭhasālinī aññena katā bhaveyya, kathaṁ tāsu aññamaññātideso sakkā kātuṁ.
anya-e0105n31:33_6: Tasmā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu abhiyācako buddhaghoso ācariyena samānanāmo cūḷabuddhaghosoti yāvajjatanā ācariyaparamparāya gahito sotatthakīganthakārako aññoyeva, na ācariyamahābuddhaghosatthero.
anya-e0105n31:34_0: Yadi pana ettakena niṭṭhaṁ na gaccheyya, evampi vicāretabbaṁ –
anya-e0105n31:34_1: kinnu kho saṅghapālādayo therā visuddhimaggādīnaṁ karaṇatthāya ācariyabuddhaghosattheraṁ āyācamānā attanā samatthataroti saddahantā āyācanti udāhu asaddahantāti?
anya-e0105n31:34_3: Tathā ca sati ācariyabuddhaghosatthero sayaṁ aññehi samatthatarova samāno kasmā aññaṁ āyāceyya.
anya-e0105n31:34_4: Na hi saddhāsampannassa thāmasampannassa yobbanasampannassa ācariyassa sundarataraṁ abhidhammaṭṭhakathaṁ kātuṁ bhāriyaṁ bhavissati.
anya-e0105n31:34_5: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu ca vuttavacanāni visuddhimaggaāgamaṭṭhakathāsu vuttasaṁvaṇṇanāvacanehi ekākārāneva honti.
anya-e0105n31:34_6: Yadi ca abhidhammaṭṭhakathaṁ añño kareyya, kathamapi tāhi vacanākārassa visadisatā bhaveyya eva.
anya-e0105n31:34_7: Etāsaṁ nigamane ca dassitena ‘‘buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā’’ti vacanena ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghosena katā’’tveva pākaṭā honti, na aññenāti.
anya-e0105n31:34_8: Yepi ‘‘aññena katā’’ti vadanti, tepi ‘‘iminā nāma therenā’’ti ekaṁsato dassetuṁ na sakkonti, tathā dassetuñca lesamattampi sādhakavacanaṁ na dissati.
anya-e0105n31:34_9: Tasmā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyopi idāni ācariyehi cūḷabuddhaghosoti voharitena buddhaghosena nāma bhikkhunāyācito visuddhimaggavinayāgamaṭṭhakathānaṁ kārako ācariyamahābuddhaghosattheroyeva akāsīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti.
anya-e0105n31:35_0: Yaṁ pana mahāvaṁse ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghoso sīhaḷadīpāgamanato pubbe jambudīpe vasanakāleyeva aṭṭhasāliniṁ akāsī’’ti adhippāyena –
anya-e0105n31:37_0: Vuttaṁ, taṁ idāni dissamānāya aṭṭhasāliniyā na sameti.
anya-e0105n31:37_1: Tattha hi ganthārambheyeva visuddhimaggaṁ atidisitvā pacchāpi so ca, samantapāsādikā ca bahūsu ṭhānesu atidisīyanti.
anya-e0105n31:37_2: Tasmā tassā ācariyena sīhaḷadīpaṁ patvā visuddhimaggañceva samantapāsādikañca katvā pacchāyeva katabhāvo ativiya pākaṭoti.
